allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: URL shortener service with Go, MySQL and Redis

This is a URL shortening service built with Go that provides:
- URL shortening with custom or auto-generated short codes
- Redis caching for fast redirects
- MySQL for persistent storage
- Docker support for easy deployment
- RESTful API endpoints

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add batch stats API endpoint for product ID lookup

- Add POST /api/batch-stats endpoint
- Support bulk retrieval of shortlinks by product IDs
- Return map of product_id -> short_url
- Use BASE_URL from environment variable
- Integration with NBS_YTBOT for batch processing

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
